level.heading: Zoning Commission powers.
level.text: Nothing in this part shall require the Zoning Commission to grant or deny an application for a zoning density increase.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-76
level.text: For Law 5-76, see notes following ยง 1-306.31.
